title: William Hill - Sports Betting & Odds
description:
Get the definitive betting experience on your mobile or tablet with the William Hill Sports Betting app. 

With instant prices on thousands of markets, stay close to the heart of the action through live streaming, advanced in-play scoreboards and up to date dashboard. Bet, watch, cash in and more – wherever and whenever you want.

GREAT FEATURES AND BETTING BONUSES
William Hill boast a range of offers and bonuses to enhance your betting experience across lots of sports not just on our popular football betting and horse racing betting markets.
•	#YourOdds: Got a hunch on the game? Tweet @WilliamHill with your bet and our traders will endeavour to price it up.
•	Bet Boost: Whether you include Premier League, the big fight or a Grand Slam, boost your accas of three or more selections - it's our biggest ever Bet Boost!
•	Flash Odds: Get the best enhancement ahead of the big game. From 6pm, Flash Odds goes live, so whether it’s the man of the moment to score or hit the target, these aren’t to be missed.
•	Bet and watch live sports: There’s no better feeling than seeing your bet win – we stream heaps of football, horse racing, tennis and more on our app.
•	Cash In: You can win even if your bet doesn’t with Cash In. It’s your opportunity to accept an early pay out offer while the action is on-going.
•	Partial Cash Out: For those seeking the best of both worlds – get something back on your bet early, while waiting for the rest to play out.
•	In-play: Bet on countless in-play markets now with advanced, in-depth scoreboards so you know exactly what’s happening. Whether there’s been a yellow card or corner kick, it’ll be tracked keeping you across all of the action.

HERE TO HELP
William Hill takes Responsible Gambling seriously because betting shouldn’t get in the way of your enjoyment of sport.
•	Our Account management: Features, include deposit limits, timings and self-exclusion, to help you stay in control.
•	Customer Services: You can get hold of us in a number of ways - phone, email, live chat, social media – whatever the communication method, we’re at your service.


KEY TERMS
•	Bet £10 get £30 in free bets
New Customers using Promo Code P30 Only, min £10/€10 stake, min odds 1/2, free bets paid as 2 x £15/€15 (30 days expiry), free bet/payment method/player/country restrictions apply.
Link to full terms: https://wh.bet/3azbROd

New Customers using Promo Code W40. Min £10/€10 stake, win only, min odds 1/2, free bets paid as 4 x £10/€10, 30 day expiry, free bet/payment method, player/country restrictions apply.
Link to full terms:  https://wh.bet/2TrjDnz


•	Bet £5 & get £10 in free bets
New Customers using Promo Code S5. Min £5/€5 stake, win only, min odds 1/2, free bets paid as 2 x £5/€5, 30 day expiry, free bet/payment method, player/country restrictions apply.
Link to full terms: https://wh.bet/2vIjWBi

•	Bet Boost: One Bet Boost on straight line accumulators per customer, per day. 3+ selections. Max stake £20 win or £10 EW. On EW bets, only “win” part Boosted. Mobile and new desktop only. Player restrictions & terms apply.

YourOdds: Betting rules and terms apply.

RESULT: Find out WHO SCORED each goal and shoot over to the MAPS screen to see the quality to each team’s chances. Get football results QUICKLY and EASILY! Hit the STATS button and you will get in-depth analysis of the match including statistics for passes, shots on target and much, much more.

TEAMS: Choose a team from any of the leagues and get a summary of their performance, results and fixtures lists, squad details and a whole host of FOOTBALL STATS to help you understand more about the team’s style of play and their strengths and weaknesses in attack and defence.

PLAYERS: Get CAREER PROFILES for every player, including their stats in the current season and those gone by, and check the TOP SCORER charts. We also give football betting predictions in the FIRST TO SCORE and ANYTIME GOALSCORER markets.

TIPS, PREDICTIONS & PREVIEWS

QUALITY OVER QUANTITY
Infogol is so much more than just another flash Live Scores football app. The strength of the app lies in the super quality of the analysis, based on our in-house developed models, powered by Opta data.

The Infogol analysts also use their knowledge to help assess a team’s rating based on past performances, manager or player changes, etc. Combining the knowledge of the analysts with the figures produced by the models means that Infogol is the ultimate app and has unrivalled power when it comes to football tips and predictions.

BetMMA.tips is run by me, Mike Jeynes, a long time sports and MMA fan living in Leeds, UK. I've been working in MMA full time since 2009 and branched into betting on the UFC as an interesting project in 2014.

title: Racing Post - Horse Racing Tips, Cards & Results
description:
Informed betting during Cheltenham is easier with Racing Post’s comprehensive horse racing cards and results. Get our experts’ Cheltenham tips and claim the latest free bets and registration offers. It’s the must-have app for the must-have info.


APP FEATURES INCLUDE:

HORSERACING CARDS
Need to see the field before you make your selection and place your bet?

Read about every horse running in every race, every day of the Cheltenham Festival, with our detailed racecards. Our full form study lets you delve deeper into individual form, race records and pedigree than ever before.

Our Cheltenham racecards are easy to read, and you can place your bets quickly using them. You can study the runners in every race, including the very best races from the UK, Ireland and more.

HORSE RACING TIPS
To get the best value bets, listen to our renowned tipsters. Our Spotlight Verdict predicts the most likely Cheltenham winners, plus we pick out the killer key stat in each race. We also compile the horseracing tips from all our leading tipsters and other national publications.

See the Racing Post Predictor’s animated prediction of the final placings, based on unique Racing Post stats and ratings.


WATCH LIVE RACING
Can’t make it to the Cheltenham races? Don’t worry, the Racing Post app is the best place to watch horseracing live when you’re on the move.

You can watch all the Cheltenham races today on the Racing Post app. Just place a bet of £1 or more on any UK or Irish race and you can see how your horse gets on with our Watch Live service. You’ll never miss a winning moment again!

HORSERACING BETTING & FREE BET OFFERS
Once you’ve made your selection, you can bet through Racing Post with our six partner bookmakers Coral, Paddy Power, William Hill, Ladbrokes, bet365 and Betfair.

Our integrated betslip means you don’t have to leave the Racing Post app to place your Cheltenham bets. We’re your one-stop shop for horseracing betting this Cheltenham Festival.

You can also take advantage of free bets, bet offers and our Best Odds Guaranteed on UK and Irish races every day on the Racing Post mobile app.

We have exclusive registration offers from our partner bookmakers. Select ‘Accounts’ in the app to register quickly and easily, or ‘Free Bets’ to compare all our betting offers and free bets.

HORSERACING NEWS & RACEDAY LIVE
Keep on top of the racing throughout the day with our breaking news service.

Following the market movers? Need updates on the racecourse going? Want to know about any non-runners? Want to find out the Cheltenham winners today? Our on-course experts will let you know all the latest news on Raceday Live.

HORSERACING RESULTS
Can’t see the race and want to know how your horse got on? Looking for the winners in today’s Cheltenham racing fixtures? Our horseracing results service will update you.

We provide you with a fast horseracing result followed by a more detailed analysis of every runner in the race. It’s the easiest and quickest way to check the latest results on the move.


FEEDBACK
Send your comments and suggestions about our app to appfeedback@racingpost.com

Racing Post backs responsible gambling. To get help when you need it, visit begambleaware.org or call the national gambling helpline on 08088020133.

title: Valuebet App - Betting Tips
description:
The Valuebet App is a sports betting price comparison app to help Sports Bettors with betting tips and strategies to win more sports bets by comparing the price of their Odds to the Market price to determine its value. The key to successful sports betting or any form of gambling is to extract value from a bet. Value means that the odds you are getting is better than the 'Market' Odds. Finding underpriced odds and making consistent value bets will ensure long-term betting success. The app is a value bet calculator that simplifies the math for the user.

Sports bettors usually bet on emotions or bias information. Imagine before buying a phone, you do a price comparison. If the phone is priced on the market at $150, but you can buy it at $110, then you are getting value. Conversely, if the phone is priced at $100 and you are paying $110, then you are overpaying. This principle can be applied to Sports Betting. If you are paying $110 for a bet that should be priced at $150, then you are getting value.

Winning at sports betting in the long-term is not about picking winners, but about finding value. The Valuebet App helps sports bettor win more bets by allowing them to input the odds they receive, and compare it to the other odds available on the market. They will then be able to know which bet is a good value bet, and which bet is a bad bet.  This will prevent sports bettors from making bad bets where they overpay for a sports bet.

Key Features:
	•	Input your Odds
	•	Compare your Odds to the market
	•	See if you are getting value based on the Value Points
	•	Get notified whenever there is a big line movement
	•	Only make bets where you are getting value
	•	Win more Sports Bets
	•	FREE to use everyday

Step 1: Sign up with your Name and Email
Step 2: Upon registration, you will receive 2 FREE tokens daily
Step 3: Go to the ’Available’ screen and see the games that you want to unlock
Step 4: Unlock the games you want, which will be moved to ‘Watching’
Step 5: Go to ‘Watching’ screen and see the data about the games you unlocked
Step 6: Adjust the Odds and Price in ‘Watching’ to compare it to the market

See our FAQ for more details: http://valuebet.co/help-center/

Check out our Blog to learn how the Valuebet App can help you win more Sports Bets: http://valuebet.co/blog/


***The Value Bet Pro app is coming later, with many features and enhancements to make it even to make value bets. Make the value bet app the only sports betting app you'll ever need.***

The Valuebet app is not a sportsbook, and is not affiliated with any betting or gambling sites. The Valuebet is a sports betting app and tool that gives betting tips by comparing user's Odds against the Market Odds. 

The Valuebet App makes watching sports more enjoyable as a casual bettor by giving the user a value edge over the person they are betting with. Betting with you friends can let you enjoy things such as a win free meal, or  the next round of beer. 

Regardless whether you are a professional bettor who needs a simple by highly useful value bet app calculator, or a casual bettor looking for a small edge by finding value bets, the Valuebet App caters to both type. Check it out, you won't be disappointed.
summary: Win more sports bets with the Valuebet App, a revolutionary sports betting tool.

title: Football Betting Tips : Free Football Prediction
description:
Statistical prediction is a method used in sports betting, to predict the outcome of matches by means of statistical tools and using complex math formulas. 

  

Who doesn’t want to predict the result of a football (soccer) match? The best way to make a prognosis is to estimate the probability of the outcome. 

You cannot work out the probability of winning a football match by assuming that win, lose and draw are equally likely, 

but you can look at previous results in similar matches and use these results to estimate the probability of winning. 

  

Football Prediction app doesn't have emotions and it doesn't support any club. It knows nothing about the number of fans or the amount of money clubs have. 

The only thing that matters are previous results and based on them it predicts the future results. 

And it's really good at it. 

  

This application tracks all league matches of the world most famous leagues including: 

-  England 

-  Spain 

-  Germany 

-  Italy 

-  France 

-  Netherlands 

-  Portugal 

-  Turkey 

-  Russia 

-  Belgium 

-  Polen 

-  Czech Republic 

-  Scotland 

-  Romania 

-  Austria 

-  Hungary 

-  Ukraine 

-  Sweden 

-  Norway 

-  Greece 

  

  

There are many other leagues too and we are constantly trying to increase the number of leagues. 

If you can't find your local league, use "manual input" and enter performance data by yourself. You will get an equally good calculation. 

  

The app will estimate the probability of particular match outcome and derivatives of an outcome, such as: 

-  Full Time Outcome, 

-  Half Time Result, 

-  Double Chance, 

-  Draw No Bet, 

-  HT/FT, 

-  Handicap, 

-  Goals Under/Over, 

-  Exact Goals, 

-  Exact Score. 

  

Everything is transparent and beautifully organized by leagues, seasons and by rounds so that every match, pre-match predictions and the results of matches can easily be found. 

Data used to predict the match are the ones that were available before the match was played. 

Once you download data you can use the application in an offline mode. 

  

This is not a live score app but results are refreshed at least once a day which is enough for quality predictions. 

  

We don't need to give you false promises about how good is app, at any time you can check all previous predictions and their efficiency in reviews organized by leagues, odds type and time period. 

  

IMPORTANT NOTE: This application does not encourage sports betting in any way, it is intended for informational and entertainment purposes only! 

  

This is a FREE version (Ad - supported), if you like Football Prediction you can buy the version without ads through a link in our app.

FREEPLAY LOYALTY SCHEME T&CS
